verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Make me a blessing,
Make me a blessing,

Out of my life
may Jesus shine;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Make me a blessing,
O Savior, I pray

Make me a blessing
to someone today.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Out in the highways
and by ways of life,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Carry the sunshine where darkness is rife,

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: Tell the sweet story of Christ and His love,
Tell of His pow’r to forgive;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: Others will trust Him if only you prove

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: Give as ‘twas given to you in your need,
Love as the Master loved you;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Be to the helpless
a helper indeed,
